name: Bruh Game
description:
-In "Bruh Game" you play as a red ball. You are being chased by the Enemy. Your goal is to collect 9 red balls (with red light underneath) to defeat the Enemy. If enemy gets really close to you, he stabs you with his thing, and then you die. If you collide with obstacles, your health is decreased by 25. Enemy gets stronger with every level and every red ball you collect. 

-There are currently 7 levels

-Its my first ever game, it has few minor bugs that are not game-braking, made it in Unity using mostly default unity 3D stuff (cubes, spheres, etc.), for sounds I used free sound effects that i found on the internet

-Total play time is around 5-15 minutes, depending on how skilled you are

-This is not a "serious" project, just a medium-difficulty, low quality "for the lulz" game

-Soundtrack from the game (not mine): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=riwtIR_hX6A

-Please leave a comment, any kind of comment
